title: I would like to buy a T210-3
author: vintagebaseballcardguy

posts.post_title: I would like to buy a T210-3
posts.post_content:
Ungraded is preferred or a graded card is ok, too.  Seems like most I have seen are in the VG/3 range.  Email me a price and scan (front and back) of what you have to [url]rchilders1973@gmail.com[/url]. I only have two thus far.  Thanks.

Edited to add:  I have found and purchased one.  I will bump this thread when I am ready for more.  Thanks. 

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk
